Software Setup

Terminal tools:

  • TotalTerminal: TotalTerminal is a plugin for Terminal.app. It provides persistent Visor Window which slides down when you press a hot-key. Courtesy of @jgmalcolm.

  • IR_Blank: a black OS X terminal theme with colors to improve readability.

  • Solarized: a sixteen color palette (eight monotones, eight accent colors) designed for use with terminal and gui applications. Courtesy of @yapatel525.

Text editors:

*Text Wrangler: A general-purpose text editor for light-duty composition, data-file editing, and manipulation of text-oriented data.
